fields.name: didweb
fields.label: Service Provider DID:WEB
fields.help: The DID:WEB of the service provider / issuer publishing the Gaia-X Service Credential.

fields.name: credentialHostingPath
fields.label: Service Credential Hosting Path
fields.help: The base path to your public storage of Gaia-X Service Credentials.

fields.name: pathToParticipantCredential
fields.label: Service Provider Participant Credential
fields.help: URI of the service provider Gaia-X Participant Credential required to identity the responsible service provider.

fields.name: knownDependencyCredentials
fields.label: Known Dependency Credentials
fields.help: Contains resolvable links to the Gaia-X service credentials related to this service that can exist independently of it.

fields.name: knownAggregatedServiceCredentials
fields.label: Known Aggregated Resource Credentials
fields.help: Contains resolveable links to Gaia-X Resource and Service Credentials related to this service that can exist independently of it.
